reviewText: I love the 80's movies as they remind me of childhood.  And my nickname in high school came about because of Ferris.  These are all classic movies.
Title: Too Cool for School: The John Hughes Collection

reviewText: Would have loved if they added Weird Science and National Lampoon's Vacation but asking for more would just be too greedy. These are the definitive coming-of-age movies that will forever be the best of any kind. Also would have loved if the cases holding the separate DVDs weren't so super thin but again three awesome movies for the price of one, the satisfaction is already fulfilled.
Title: Too Cool for School: The John Hughes Collection

reviewText: First of all this set is a steal when one dvd costs $20.00 it does not take a genius to know your getting three movies for the price of one.I love all the movies in this set how could any John Hughes fan not love them.What memories these movies bring back and I love "getting the cast together" on the Ferris Buller dvd. It was great to see the cast after all this time only Mia Sara and Charlie Sheen were not in the recent interviews.
Title: Too Cool for School: The John Hughes Collection

reviewText: Fantastic set of DVD's so well worth the $20 I think I spent on it, couldn't believe I found such a greA+ deal on here!  I love the movies, and they were brand new, for like I said under $20!  you really can't beat that price, or the quality, let alone the speedy FREE delivery.  I love Amazon!  they have become my new shopping obsession!Very Pleased!
summary: awesomeness in the form of nostalgia
Title: Too Cool for School: The John Hughes Collection

reviewText: am glad i found this steal from my teen years especially for the price. I will enjoy it for years to come. thank u and the product came in time as well thank u
Title: Too Cool for School: The John Hughes Collection

reviewText: brings back many memories and fun times...applicable to all generations watch it several times to catch the lines that are classic.
Title: Too Cool for School: The John Hughes Collection
